content.raw:
I would say we need to add the topic  '/atlas/synchronization_statistics' to our test list. It was probably added after this pull request. It's failing both in my local machine and jenkins:

```
19: [atlas_utils.qual_task_1_rosapi/test_extra_topics][FAILURE]---------------------
19: Items in the first set but not the second:
19: '/atlas/synchronization_statistics'
```

content.raw:
For the damping services, I've seen a weird failing cases both in jenkins and my local machine from the test suite. If I run the the VRCs worls manually, I can confirm that they are advertised.

```
11: [atlas_utils.atlas_sandia_hands_rosapi/test_extra_services][FAILURE]------------
11: Items in the first set but not the second:
11: '/sandia_hands/set_joint_damping'
11: '/atlas/set_joint_damping'
11: '/sandia_hands/get_joint_damping'
11: '/atlas/get_joint_damping'
```

later in the same test, some console msgs seems to tell that they are passing:

```
11: [atlas_utils.atlas_sandia_hands_rosapi/test_service_atlas_get_joint_damping][passed]
11: [atlas_utils.atlas_sandia_hands_rosapi/test_service_atlas_set_joint_damping][passed]
11: [atlas_utils.atlas_sandia_hands_rosapi/test_service_sandia_hands_get_joint_damping][passed]
11: [atlas_utils.atlas_sandia_hands_rosapi/test_service_sandia_hands_set_joint_damping][passed]
...
```

content.raw:
I've fixed both problems in 6f9c6e2 which lives at branch issue_240_fix_tests. @gerkey please, give it a look and if it seems sane, feel free to merge.

Basic functionality, enable/disable services on presence of VRC_CHEATS_ENABLED is working as expected for me in vrc 1 world.
